thread.title: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter
thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter
text:
Vikas Bhalla turned a year older in the Bigg Boss house. While the housemates forgot his birthday, Salman Khan reminded everyone about it.

Vikas Bhalla reads his wife's letter 
Vikas' wife Punita Chopra sent a birthday card and a letter for him. Vikas broke down after reading the letter.

Vikas Bhalla breaks down after reading his wife's letter 
Bigg Boss sure made his day extra special with a heart-warming gesture.

Vikas Bhalla shows the letter sent by his wife
